item.title: Tweety Pipe
item.description: A real-time data processor built with Spark and Kafka. Data visualized with a simple Flask app and Chart.js This project has two components. The first component is twitter-spark This component gives a dynamic bargraph of the trending Twitter hastags, aiming to mimic the Twitter “trending” function. This component streams live tweets, processes and visualizes them in real-time It is composed of a Twitter app, a real-time Spark processor and a Flask app.
